taxspell
=========

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE
)
```

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/sckott/taxspell.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/sckott/taxspell)

Spell Check Taxonomic Names


## Install

Development version

```{r eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("sckott/taxspell")
```

```{r}
library("taxspell")
```
